Text:
Will this work on Samsung Galaxy S3? If yes then which .apk should i install?

@bobiras22
I did try it. The graphics are misplaced and the controls in the middle of the screen. I think the resolution is not optimized for the 1280x720 screen of the S3. Thank you anyway.

@fallenraven86

Try the xoom apk.It has 720p resolution as s3.It must work.
xoom apk works great! Thank you so much!
I'd like to make a request. I'm in final year of med school so I would really appreciate it if you could upload some medical apps please. Thank you so much. :)
